lead_paragraph: The Keeping Score column last Sunday, about the shortcomings of major college football’s Bowl Championship Series, omitted the co-author of a study that appeared last spring in The Journal of Quantitative Analysis in Sports that proposed a playoff system for the sport. In addition to Brady T. West, Madhur Lamsal also wrote the paper.
